item.title: Some recent posts over on the Mango blog
item.description: Since August, I’ve had the pleasure to work at Mango Solutions, a data science consultancy, as a Principal Consultant. In that time, I’ve been to EARL London, SQL Relay, and SQL in the City, so conference season has been in full swing with more to come in the form EARL Boston next week. Surprisingly, I’ve also found some time to help some customers out and write some blog posts over on the Mango site.
